net.verymuchme.registry
Class ThreadSafeRegistry

java.lang.Object
  net.verymuchme.registry.ThreadSafeRegistry

public class ThreadSafeRegistry
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a thread-safe location to store objects that need to be shared across threads.

Author:
tracy

Registered object or null if not present

retrieve

public static net.verymuchme.commonstatus.CommonStatus retrieve(java.lang.String registryName,
                                                                java.lang.Object defaultObject)

Get a registered object. Register the default if registered object does not exist. Thread-safe.

CommonStatus usage

  • status - always true since object always returned
  • Boolean property "defaultUsed" - indicates whether the default object was registered and returned
  • Object property specified by registryName contains returned object

Parameters:
registryName -
defaultObject -
Returns:
CommonStatus

public static void register(java.lang.String registryName,
                            java.lang.Object registeredObject)
Register an object - thread safe

Parameters:
registryName - Name of registered object
registeredObject - Object to register
